fields.title: Period One
fields.body: Alexander J. Segal, Esq, and Eliza Grinberg, Esq, founded The Law Offices of Grinberg, PLLC.

fields.title: Period Two
fields.body: Wendy Barlow, Esq, joined the team at Grinberg & Segal.

fields.title: Period Three
fields.body: Our long-time and experienced paralegal, Melsida Asatrian, became a lawyer in New Jersey. She was subsequently licensed to practice law in New York in 2016.

fields.title: Period Four
fields.body: The Law Offices of Grinberg & Segal, PLLC, moved to its current address in the heart of Manhattanâ€™s financial district at 11 Hanover Sq, 10th Fl., New York, NY, 10005
